participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: nurturing and family-oriented, with a love for stories and adventure.
participant_1.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: motivated and health-conscious, always pushing boundaries and seeking new challenges.
participant_2.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.
